Blackwater (disambiguation)013983luouxn2yfknuh5tm825selz89pfrr1q738302013-03-22T14:33:21ZThe Dragon Demands5014364{{disambig|Blackwater}}
'''Blackwater''' can refer to:

* [[Blackwater Rush]] - the river that flows into Blackwater Bay in the Crownlands. 
* [[Blackwater Bay]] - the bay of the Narrow Sea that the Blackwater Rush empties into; King's Landing is located on the north bank of the river's mouth where it enters the bay.  
* [[Battle of the Blackwater]] - Stannis Baratheon's assault on King's Landing, launched from his fleet in Blackwater Bay which landed at the mouth of the Blackwater Rush to attack the city.  
* "[[Blackwater]]" - The ninth episode of Season 2, featuring the Battle of the Blackwater.
